mapper.select: SELECT A.QNA_RN, A.QNA_NO, A.ID, A.QNA_TITLE, A.QNA_CONTENT, A.QNA_CREATE_DATE, A.QNA_MODIFY_DATE, A.QNA_STATE, A.QNA_IP, A.QNA_GROUP_NO, A.DEPTH FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QNA_GROUP_NO DESC) AS QNA_RN, QNA_NO, ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CREATE_DATE, QNA_MODIFY_DATE, QNA_STATE, QNA_IP, QNA_GROUP_NO, DEPTH FROM QNA) A WHERE A.QNA_RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
